title: Ну, погоди! Каникулы
overview: The active recreation enthusiast Hare is again unable to enjoy his vacation to the fullest, because the hooligan and scoundrel Wolf is constantly hanging around. Various conflicts constantly flare up between the aggressively minded Wolf and the peace-loving Hare – from the fight for the attention of the charming Roebuck Uli to rivalry for the main prize in bicycle races.
